name: Petzl Leopard Flexlock Crampons
description: Specifically engineered for snow approaches, these lightweight crampons feature a compact design to reduce packing volume. Burly yet featherweight aluminum 10-point design is ideal for fast travel on snow. Flex Lock binding system was built with hiking boots in mind, so doesn't require heel or toe welts.Aluminum toe and heel sections reduce overall weight.10 points design optimized for snow travel, not ice travel.Cord-Tec technology uses lightweight and ultra-strong Dyneema cord to connect the front and heel pieces together.Flex Lock binding doesn't require heel or toe welts.Fits boot sizes 36-46 (optional replacement Cord-Tec allows for use with larger boot size).Protective carry bag included.Tool-free adjustments boost convenience and minimize weight.CE and UIAA certified.
